mapper.select: SELECT misr.sign_count AS signCount, DATE_FORMAT( misr.sign_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS signTime, id FROM marketing_integral_sign_record misr WHERE misr.del_flag = '0' AND misr.member_list_id = #{paramMap.memberListId} AND DATE_FORMAT( misr.sign_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )= #{paramMap.signTime} limit 1
